columns.payment_id: The unique identifier for each payment record.
columns.invoice_id: The reference ID for the associated invoice.
columns.payment_details: The method of payment used for the transaction.

Payments.table_description: The table stores records of payments linked to invoices.

columns.meeting_id: The unique identifier for each meeting record.
columns.client_id: The reference ID for the associated client.
columns.meeting_outcome: The result or summary of the meeting.
columns.meeting_type: The category of the meeting, such as team or company.
columns.billable_yn: The indication of whether the meeting is billable.
columns.start_date_time: The scheduled start date and time of the meeting.
columns.end_date_time: The scheduled end date and time of the meeting.
columns.purpose_of_meeting: The main goal or objective of the meeting.
columns.other_details: Any additional information regarding the meeting.

Meetings.table_description: The table tracks details of meetings held with clients.

columns.agency_id: The unique identifier for each advertising agency.
columns.agency_details: The name and description of the advertising agency.

Agencies.table_description: The table stores details of advertising agencies in the system.

columns.client_id: The unique identifier for each client record.
columns.agency_id: The reference ID for the associated advertising agency.
columns.sic_code: The Standard Industrial Classification code for the client.
columns.client_details: The name and description of the client.

Clients.table_description: The table maintains records of clients linked to advertising agencies.

columns.invoice_id: The unique identifier for each invoice record.
columns.client_id: The reference ID for the associated client.
columns.invoice_status: The current status of the invoice processing.
columns.invoice_details: The description or quality rating of the invoice.

Invoices.table_description: The table manages invoice records linked to clients.

columns.meeting_id: The unique identifier for each meeting attended by staff.
columns.staff_id: The unique identifier for each staff member participating in meetings.

Staff_in_Meetings.table_description: The table records associations between staff members and meetings.

columns.staff_id: The unique identifier for each staff member.
columns.agency_id: The reference ID for the associated advertising agency.
columns.staff_details: The name and description of the staff member.

Staff.table_description: The table maintains records of staff members and their agency affiliations.
